title: Letters: Hillary Clinton's History With Privacy
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block and Don Gonyea share letters from listeners about the story last week on Hillary Clinton's history with privacy. Listeners wondered why NPR's Tamara Keith mentioned that Clinton's dress was pink when she spoke at a press conference in 1994.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
